org.hammurapi
Interface Waiver

All Known Implementing Classes:
DomWaiver
public interface Waiver

Waiver is a way to suppress a particular violation.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Pavel Vlasov

getInspectorName

public java.lang.String getInspectorName()
Returns:
Inspector name to which this waiver applies

waive

public boolean waive(Violation violation,
                     boolean peek)
Parameters:
violation - Violation to waive
peek - If true waiver doesn't change it state.
Returns:
true if Violation shall be waived

isActive

public boolean isActive()
Returns:

getSignatures

public java.util.Collection getSignatures()
Returns:
Collection of signatures waived by this inspector. Can be null.
